statement.tex: \text{Find the point on the curve}\\ \quad y = x^3 -11x + 5 \\ \text{at which the tangent is }y=x-11.
\\ \text{Is the analysis below complete and correct?}

reason.tex: \text{Compare }y = x-11\text{ with the general equation}\\ \text{of a line, }y = mx+c.\text{ This will give }m=1.
\text{Do not ignore x=-2 as a possibility. There is no}\\ \text{good reason to ignore it until much later.}
